sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Servos provide precise, limited-range movement for arms, claws, and similar mechanisms. Standard servos move to a position and hold it. Continuous rotation servos spin like motors.

sections.title: Basic Servo Use
sections.content: Position values 0.0–1.0 represent the servo's range. Check manufacturer specs for actual angular range.

sections.title: Multiple Servos and Gradual Movement
sections.content: Initialize each servo with a unique hardware map name. For smooth motion, change position in small increments over time. Keep positions within 0.0–1.0 to avoid damage.
